title: Uthman Taha's Bold Naskh Font Released
content:
Hi All,

King Fahd Glorious Quran Printing Complex just released Uthman Taha's Bold Naskh Font. Please download and review, and give us your comments. Keep in mind this is version 0.07 a lot of improvements yet have to come. Zip file contains Normal and Bold fonts and License.txt file. Both Fonts are Free for everyone.

Home page:  
 [http://fonts.qurancomplex.gov.sa](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015154651/http:/fonts.qurancomplex.gov.sa/ "http://fonts.qurancomplex.gov.sa")

Downlaod Link:  
 [http://fonts.qurancomplex.gov.sa/download/UthmanTN1\_Ver07.zip](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015154651/http:/fonts.qurancomplex.gov.sa/download/UthmanTN1_Ver07.zip "http://fonts.qurancomplex.gov.sa/download/UthmanTN1\_Ver07.zip")

Thanks
author: Ashfaq_Niazi
